archimate:BusinessService.name: Transaction Authorization
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A customer is authenticated making contact through a channel
General comment:
Required authorization levels may be defined and interpreted by different fulfillment service domains that may be involved in the interactive transaction completion. This service domain is used to mitigate transaction risk for interactive product and service access fulfillment and works in collaboration with customer identity authentication services.
Business Purpose : A capability to provide a risk based authorization for interactive customer transactions. This can combine the context (channel) transaction and customer details and recent activity analysis as appropriate. The authorization may require a specific level of party/customer authentication to get approval.
Пример использования:
Клиент аутентифицируется, устанавливая контакт через канал
Общее замечание:
Требуемые уровни авторизации могут быть определены и интерпретированы различными доменами услуг исполнения, которые могут быть вовлечены в интерактивное завершение транзакции. Этот домен службы используется для снижения риска транзакций при выполнении интерактивного доступа к продуктам и службам и работает в сотрудничестве со службами идентификации клиентов.
деловая цель : Возможность предоставления авторизации на основе рисков для интерактивных операций с клиентами. Это может объединить контекстную (канальную) проводку и сведения о клиенте,а также анализ последних действий. Для получения разрешения может потребоваться определенный уровень проверки подлинности стороны/клиента.
Transaction Authorization This service domain is used to mitigate transaction risk for interactive product and service access fulfillment and works in collaboration with customer identity authentication services. It analyses recent customer activity in order to detect possible out of pattern/fraudulent behavior and authorizes transactions accordingly. The authorization can be subject to obtaining increased levels of customer authentication by requiring the customer to provide additional proof of identity.
Detailed Summary This service domain handles risk based authorization for interactive customer transactions. This combines the context (channel) transaction, customer details and recent activity analysis as appropriate. The authorization may require a specific level of party/customer authentication to get approval.
Executive Summary This service domain handles risk based authorization for interactive customer transactions. This combines the context (channel) transaction, customer details and recent activity analysis as appropriate. The authorization may require a specific level of party/customer authentication to get approval.
Examples Of Use A customer payment request from their current account is authorized during an assisted servicing session
